title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2601/97 of 17 December 1997 establishing, pursuant to Article 30 of Council Regulation (EEC) No 404/93, a reserve for 1998 to resolve cases of hardship
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2601/97 of 17 December 1997 establishing, pursuant to Article 30 of Council Regulation (EEC) No 404/93, a reserve for 1998 to resolve cases of hardship
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: A reserve of 20 000 tonnes is hereby established to allow the adoption of specific measures pursuant to Article 30 of Regulation (EEC) No 404/93 to resolve cases of hardship suffered by some traders as a result of the entry into force of the common organization of the market in bananas. The reserve shall be counted against the tariff quota for imports of third-country and non-traditional ACP bananas available for 1998, pursuant to Article 18 of the above Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1998.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 17 December 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
